title: Suggestions For League
body:
Hey riot i have a suggestion for ranked, what if you made it so that ranked is made in a team builder fashion, but you pick a lane but not the champ until it gets to the lobby where you are guaranteed to get your lane. I honestly believe this will work considering people will get the lane they are comfortable in and they will gain more lp and boost the league community in a whole. Lets leave bronze for the new players and give other people that are stuck there a chance to rise and be the best that can. Thanks for reading :)
TL;DR
Make a team builder ranked where you are guaranteed to get your lane ;)

replies.body:
That's what they ARE doing.

Good to see you keep up to date and just request things they ask for.

Just adding some sources here, it is definitely something we have in the pipeline.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/02/red-post-collection-lyte-on-tribunal.html#1

> **Lyte** also reiterated that they are currently working on a ranked version of Team Builder:
> "We're working on a Team Builder version of Ranked that is just selecting positions. That system in particular should help address problems like the one you noted."

Hey Maraudaur, is there any info that you have on your end on whether teambuilder ranked would be the same as normal ranked or whether they are going to get separate MMR's?

Personally i don't really want to see Team builder ranked take over.

Sorry man I am unsure about that at this point. 

Would be interested to hear why you wouldn't want ranked team builder to replace normal ranked though?

The pros are obviously it would completely eliminate people who troll/flame/act negatively when they dont get their role.

>The pros are obviously it would completely eliminate people who troll/flame/act negatively when they dont get their role.

First i want to counter this pro with this.

All it does is DELAY a toxic player, if a players is prepared to be toxic, they will be toxic over anything, not just over role, sure your stopping it happening in champion select, but that doesn't stop the root cause.

As for why i don't want it to completely take over and get the same rank, i feel like Team builder Ranked and Normal Ranked ARE 2 different things, being able to climb in TB ranked means plain and simply, you can carry in the one role you pick, whereas Normal ranked means your not just climbing because of this because you have to actually put the effort in to be able to do at least a few roles.

Of course that comes down to opinion, i do recall at one point someone asked if i would support it if it had separate ranks per role, and i'm inclined to agree with that thought (that you can be a diamond mid laner and a silver top laner)

Honestly i won't be thrilled if Team builder ranked comes through because i have a feeling it won't actually be as good as it sounds in theory, but in practice, is just delaying the reveal of the trolls.

That's an interesting concept you have there. I'm not sure I agree with the delay part.

I would highly suggest you watch this video it gives great insight into the kind of behvaiour we are seeing in game. (Especially watch the **"Analyzing the Player Behaviour Problem"** bit)
http://gdcvault.com/play/1017940/The-Science-Behind-Shaping-Player

**Key part**
Most players you come across (98%) are not inherently toxic players. Most players are neutral to positive **most** of the time but have outbursts every now and then due to a combination of reasons (real life factors, previous games,etc).

When one of these normal players has a bad day or whatever that's when they are on edge and easily frustrated. In this situation I believe the more points of friction we can remove the better. Why wouldn't we look to remove as many points of conflict as possible through the design of the game? e.g. team builder, and default all chat off.

Champion select right now in my opinion fosters conflict, it is common to have multiple people on the same team fighting over the same role.

If we removed this point of conflict, players can focus more on team compositions and working together.

I do agree TB ranked and current ranked are different things, that's why I asked why you wouldn't want current ranked to be **replaced** by TB ranked considering it has the huge benefit of removing conflict and allowing our players to play the role they want.
Pick order works fine thanks friend.
Obvs not for everyone thanks friend
